scripts.rmdir: node -e "var fs = require('fs');process.argv.slice(1).map((fpath)=>{ try {fs.rmdirSync(fpath,{recursive: true})} catch(e){console.warn('Error folder:', fpath, e)}});process.exit(0);"
scripts.build: npm run rmdir -- public && npm run build:html & npm run build:css & npm run build:js & npm run build:files
